Package com.gmail.woodyc40.commons.event

Event framework used to listen and call for events that are not suited for use by using the BukkitAPI PluginManager.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    CustomEvent
    The standard type used to represent an Event called in the framework
    EventHandler
    Handles events called by the framework
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Events
    The events utility for calling and registering their respective events through an asynchronous environment
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    EventType
    Enumeration representing all of the types of event that can be called
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    NoEventAnnotationException
    Thrown when an EventHandler is not annotated with a Handler annotation
  • Annotation Types Summary 
    Annotation Type Description
    Handler
    The type of event the EventHandler handles

Package com.gmail.woodyc40.commons.event Description

Event framework used to listen and call for events that are not suited for use by using the BukkitAPI PluginManager.

This event framework is thread safe.
